Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, Fluburtur here, boss of Cat Industries (might create a real company) and let me present you the finest plane my engineers (me) have made!

The K919

I could give you a speech describing the abilities of this little baby but I made a video because a picture is worth 1000 words or something like that.

(given the video lasts 384 seconds and this video is at 29 frames per seconds we have 11136 pictures, that makes 11136000 words! Could you imagine! )

You can download it here, I only included the stock version because I have like 5 different version going to the light fighter to the long range tactical atomic bomber.

Hope you enjoy this fine piece of engineering, please modify it as you wish and post pictures here!

(Action group 1 is bound to the parachutes by the way, and the abort button is fun too)

Any ressemblance to an existing aircraft is purely a coincidence

Edited November 1, 2015 by Fluburtur

Cool plane! and btw, you can directly link a video to a post using the little film icon up top, just put your vid URL in there and you should be all set, its to the left othe the blue circle-cube thing
Thanks, I tried it the first time but it didn't work for some reason.
Not bad at all! I would recommend moving the ailerons inwards or extend it to a full span aileron/flap.

I put the outward to provide the most roll control but I could add flaps, it could add to this thing's ability to fly at slow speeds.

Seriously, this thing can fly super fast and super slow and can lift 10t
